alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:29PM EDT until July 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN WINDHAM...NORTHERN TOLLAND...NORTHERN HARTFORD... SOUTHWESTERN WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE AND HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 428 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palmer, or 12 miles east of Springfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters have reported a history of wind damage with these storms. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Agawam, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Holden, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow and Ellington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
